thread.title: WEATHERFORD INTERNATIONAL PLC Files SEC form 8-K, Results of Operations and Financial Condition, Regulation FD Disclo
thread.title_full: WEATHERFORD INTERNATIONAL PLC Files SEC form 8-K, Results of Operations and Financial Condition, Regulation FD Disclo

title: WEATHERFORD INTERNATIONAL PLC Files SEC form 8-K, Results of Operations and Financial Condition, Regulation FD Disclo
text:
Show all filings for WEATHERFORD INTERNATIONAL PLC 
Form 8-K for WEATHERFORD INTERNATIONAL PLC 
21-Oct-2015 
Results of Operations and Financial Condition, Regulation FD Disclo Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. 
On October 21, 2015, Weatherford International public limited company ("we" or the "Company") issued a news release announcing results for the quarter ended September 30, 2015. A copy of the news release is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 and incorporated into this Item 2.02. 
On October 22, 2015, we will hold a conference call at 8:30 a.m. eastern time ("ET"), 7:30 a.m. central time ("CT"), regarding the quarterly results for the Company's third quarter ended September 30, 2015. This scheduled conference call was previously announced on August 14, 2015. To access the call, please contact the conference call operator at 866-393-8572, or 706-643-6499 for international calls, and ask for the Weatherford conference call. The call will also be made available via real-time webcast. A replay of the call will be available until 5:00 p.m. ET, November 5, 2015. The number for the replay is 855-859-2056 or 404-537-3406 for international calls; passcode 15334065. 
An enhanced webcast of the conference call and replay will be provided by NASDAQ OMX Corporate Solutions and will be available through Weatherford's web site at http://www.weatherford.com. To access the conference call and replay, click on the Investor Relations link and then click on the Enhanced Audio Webcast link. Item 7.01 Regulation FD Disclosure. 
On October 21, 2015, we issued a news release announcing results for the Company's third quarter ended September 30, 2015. A copy of the press release is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 and incorporated into this Item 7.01. Item 9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. 
(d) Exhibits 
The exhibits listed below are furnished pursuant to Item 9.01 of this Form 8-K. Exhibit Number Exhibit Description News release dated October 21, 2015, announcing results for the 99.1 quarter ended September 30, 2015.
